chapter.p:
Phoebius framework v1.0

The latest stable release is v1.0, branched out at November 1, 2009.

It’s features are:

  • the code generator
  • object relational mapping with scalable type system
  • data access objects with various relational patterns
  • php-driven template engine similar to ASP.NET

chapter.title: Samples
chapter.p: Framework is not enough to make life easier. We advice you to download an application stub which offers a unified directory structure and provides various bootstrapping scripts. After you do this, extract the contents of the framework into a /phoebius directory.
We think, that the best documentation is samples, therefore we develop phoebius.org website completely on our framework, and provide a public access to its source code repository: git.phoebius.org
